comprehension.description: Understanding the given environment, goal, and available actions.

planning.description: Ability to create an efficient plan based on the given information and environment.

execution.description: Ability to perform the planned actions and adapt based on the environmental feedback.

error_handling.description: Ability to recover from invalid actions or environmental changes.

efficiency.description: Completing tasks with the least number of actions.

format_adherence.description: Strict adherence to the required input and output formats.

termination.description: Terminating the task only when necessary and according to the instructions.
